programme.title: Ip Man 2
programme.desc: International superstar Donnie Yen reprises his iconic role as the real-life kung fu grandmaster Ip Man. Master Ip, a new arrival in British-occupied Hong Kong, wants to open a martial arts academy to teach his unique Wing Chun style. A corrupt cabal of martial arts masters, led by Master Hung (Sammo Hung) refuses to allow him to teach in peace until he proves himself in a series of fights against the local master, which Ip does, in style. But even after earning the respect of the local masters, Ip’s troubles are far from over. Hong Kong under British rule is a new world of corruption and conflict between the Chinese locals and the British expats that run the city. When a Western-style boxer named “Twister” (Darren Shahlavi) comes to town to entertain the Brits, he insults Chinese martial arts in a horrifically violent way, and Ip is forced by honor to enter a brutal “King of the Ring” boxing match against Twister- and it’s East versus West in an amazing, knock-down drag-out fight to the finish.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Behind every great martial artist lies a teacher. Ip Man, starring Donnie Yen, is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, grandmaster of Wing Chun and mentor to legendary kung fu superstar Bruce Lee. Set in Fo Shan, China during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man vividly brings to life the brutality of the infamous Japanese occupation, where once proud men are forced to fight to the death for a precious bag of rice. Defined by courage and humility, Ip Man, whose fighting skills are revered all over China, rises to the fore front. Upon refusing to teach his martial arts to the invading Japanese soldiers, he is forced to fight for the honor of his country in a series of battles that will culminate in a kill-or-be-killed showdown with Japan’s greatest fighter.

programme.title: Ip Man 2
programme.desc: International superstar Donnie Yen reprises his iconic role as the real-life kung fu grandmaster Ip Man. Master Ip, a new arrival in British-occupied Hong Kong, wants to open a martial arts academy to teach his unique Wing Chun style. programme.desc: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

programme.title: Alex Thomas: Next Up
programme.desc: Alex Thomas brings his best performance yet as he lights the stage on fire with explosive comedy. This all out, no holds barred freestyle comedy genius is what The Unleashed Comedy series is all about. Follow Alex as he captivates your attention and leaves you laughing helplessly gasping for air. From old school style to new school flavor, Alex Thomas can show and proves why he's got next.

programme.title: Big Black Comedy Vol 2
programme.desc: Comedian/actress Mo'Nique returns to host this all-star lineup which includes Sexy Marlo, Rodman, Vince Morris, and Ralphie May. Once again her Co-host is the one and only Rodney Perry.

programme.title: Kirly Sue's Global Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, Kirly-Sue travels to Jamaica to see how ginger is grown and learns some tasty easy-to-make ginger dishes. Fresh fruit salad in a hollowed-out pineapple with a mango and ginger sauce and a chickpea curry are yours to try.

programme.title: Kirly Sue's Global Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, travel around Jamaica as Kirly-Sue learns to cook iconic dishes using fresh coconut. Unleash your tastebuds with plant-based versions of Jamaican classics Conmeal Pudding and Stew Peas.

programme.title: Kirly Sue's Global Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the versatility of the sweet potato, an ingredient that is available all across Jamaica. Kirly-Sue shares a rare recipe for Sweet Potato Pudding and Ital Stew that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Single & Successful
programme.desc: Three single mothers enter into a one of a kind business boot camp to learn how to be successful.

programme.title: Single & Successful
programme.sub-title: What Would You Risk for Success?
programme.desc: Contestants learn how to put themselves 'on the line' and take risks.
Returning from deployment in Afghanistan, a U.S. Marine (Victor Almanzar) must face the consequences of a violent past he hoped he had left behind.

programme.title: A Clear Shot
programme.desc: A hostage situation at an electronic store in California goes a wry when bullets start flying. Will law enforcement be able to come in and save the day or will the hostage takers win.

programme.title: A Patch of Fog
programme.desc: A security guard catches a famous writer/television host shoplifting and blackmails him into becoming friends.
